Advertisement

Kerry Washington rocked a bold black and silver dress with a severe bob at Monday night's Met Gala in NYC.

The Scandal star, 40, looked fabulous in the figure-hugging Michael Kors number that featured spaghetti straps and a side split.

The full-length dress was patterned with contrasting panels, embellishments and nude cutouts.

Scroll down for video

Stunner: Kerry Washington rocked a bold black and silver dress with a severe bob at Monday night's Met Gala in NYC

The sweetheart neckline flashed a little bit of cleavage and the mom-of-two sported a statement silver choker.

She added inches with silver sandal heels and carried a silver clutch.

Kerry's new hairstyle framed her pretty face and she added a splash of color with some pink lipstick.

Mama mia: The Scandal star, 40, looked fabulous in the figure-hugging Michael Kors number that featured spaghetti straps and a side split

Shiny: The mother-of-two added silver sandal heels, a silver clutch and a silver statement choker to complete her look

Keryr's date for the night was the designer himself.

Last year, he had had to dress the actress when she was pregnant with her second child Caleb, whom she and her husband Nnamdi Asomugha welcomed last October.

This time around, Kors told E!, he wanted her 'to show those curves!'

He described his creation as punk attitude meets Hollywood-New York glamour.
